pageDesc: The Novak Tennis Center is exaclty that - a center. Around it are tennis courts, a cafe, restaurant, and gym with tons of content. This is a place that gets top athletes together, along with those who are yet to become ones. And it’s a place that bears the name of Novak Djokovic.
text1: It’s a place named after Novak Djokovic. A name known to people all over our planet. That is the great responsibility we feel towards our long-time client. That's why we are rigorous about making sure everything that’s published on the Instagram page represents the name of this tennis center in the best light. And we control that quality through the photos and video content we create for the Novak Tennis Center.

projectInfo.work: Work: Social media management, Content creation, Event

metaDesc: A project we are proud of - Novak Tennis Center, which bears the name of the world's greatest tennis player and operates according to the philosophy and principles of Novak Djokovic.
